name: Tile Crush - Twist on Mahjong
description:
Ready for a fun twist on classic mahjong puzzles? Try Tile Crush - an exiting matching game, especially for those who love mahjong & match 3 puzzles! Enjoy hundreds of beautiful boards and unlimited challenging levels.

The rules of the game are simple - find same pairs of tiles, place them into the box and clear the board! You need to match them quickly before the time runs out! Enjoy weekly challenges and win rewards!

Features:
- unlimited amount of challenging puzzles;
- rewards for completing weekly challenge;
- beautiful skins for your choice;
- useful hints.

Play now Tile Crush - Tiles Matching Game and pass the time with the best pair matching puzzle! Brain training games were never so addictive!
